forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: private areas

comments.text: private areas can only be joined by those who are made editor in it, or, temporarily, if an editor pings them from the area. they also won't appear in searches or the areas dialog.
as editor you can make an area private by going to the area dialog (mountain icon on main dialog), then the "..." page, then hit "private".
if you are editor in area that's private and you want to go there, one way is to make a teleport to it by scripting e.g. "when touched then send nearby to areaname".
you may also find the private area in your areas dialog in the "visited" section, if you've been there before. you can also ★ favorite it to find it easier next time.

thread.latestCommentText: you may also find the private area in your areas dialog in the "visited" section, if you've been there before. you can also ★ favorite it to find it easier next time.
